com.bouyguesenergiesservices.opcuafctaddon

Class GetOPCScriptFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bouyguesenergiesservices.opcuafctaddon.GetOPCScriptFunctions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GetOPCRPC
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GetOPCClientFunctions, GetOPCGatewayFunctions

    public abstract class GetOPCScriptFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
implements GetOPCRPC
    When the script functions are called from the Gateway, client, or designer, "system.byes.opc" the actual code is executed here. Classes in the Gateway and client extend this class within their scopes and implement any abstract functions in their own way. Created by regis on 18/10/2016.

      • readValues

        public java.util.List<com.inductiveautomation.ignition.common.model.values.QualifiedValue> readValues(java.lang.String remoteServer,
                                                                                                      java.lang.String opcServer,
                                                                                                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> lstItemPath)
        Description copied from interface: GetOPCRPC
        Equivalent to the system.opc.readValue in the local gateway for dispatching to Local or GAN.
        Specified by:
        readValues in interface GetOPCRPC
        Parameters:
        remoteServer - Name of the remote Server set in the Gateway Settings system Name
        opcServer - The name of the OPC server connection in which the items reside.
        lstItemPath - A list of strings, each representing an item path, or address to read from.
        Returns:
        QualifiedValue[] A sequence of objects, one for each address specified, in order. Each object will contains the value, quality, and timestamp returned from the OPC server for the corresponding address.

      • isSubscribe

        public boolean isSubscribe(java.lang.String remoteServer,
                           java.lang.String subscriptionName)
        Description copied from interface: GetOPCRPC
        Check if the specify Subscription Name is currently exist in the local gateway for dispatching to Local or GAN.
        Specified by:
        isSubscribe in interface GetOPCRPC
        Parameters:
        remoteServer - Name of the remote Server set in the Gateway Settings system Name
        subscriptionName - UID of the subscription research
        Returns:
        boolean True, if the subscription is currently declare and managed else False.

      • subscribe

        public java.lang.String subscribe(java.lang.String remoteServer,
                                  java.lang.String opcServer,
                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> lstItemPath,
                                  int rate)
        Description copied from interface: GetOPCRPC
        Declare an OPC Subscription (locally or through the GAN) with lstItemPath (only integer type). Call cyclically the readSubscribeValues to refresh all values.
        Specified by:
        subscribe in interface GetOPCRPC
        Parameters:
        remoteServer - Name of the remote Server set in the Gateway Settings system Name
        opcServer - The name of the OPC server connection in which the items reside.
        lstItemPath - A list of strings, each representing an item path, or address to read from.
        rate - Frequency of the subscription
        Returns:
        String UID of the subscription declare

      • readSubscribeValues

        public java.util.List<com.inductiveautomation.ignition.common.model.values.QualifiedValue> readSubscribeValues(java.lang.String remoteServer,
                                                                                                               java.lang.String subscriptionName)
        Description copied from interface: GetOPCRPC
        Get all last OPC values states of lstItemPath subscribe before subscriptionName in the local gateway for dispatching to Local or GAN. If there is no change until the previous calling, None is return. If a subscription isn't read with "readSubscribeValues" function 30 seconds later, it is automatically unsubscribe (Timeout).
        Specified by:
        readSubscribeValues in interface GetOPCRPC
        Parameters:
        remoteServer - Name of the remote Server set in the Gateway Settings system Name
        subscriptionName - UID of the subscription research
        Returns:
        QualifiedValue[] A sequence of ALL objects (even unchanged object), one for each address specified, in order. Each object will contains the value, quality, and timestamp returned from the OPC server for the corresponding address.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        remoteServer - Name of the remote Server set in the Gateway Settings system Name
        subscriptionName - UID of the subscription research
        Returns:
